instructions:
This is the Offical Sheet for **HC SVNT DRACONES: Second Edition**.
* `Total Mass`,`Total Move` and `Cargo Points` are calcualted automatically
* Page 3: Changes made to the `Notoriety Purchase Tracking` and `Landmark Automatic Benefits`-sections doesn't affect other parts of the sheet, and must be manually changed.
* Page 3: Changes made on the `Large EXP table` automatically edit your `stats` accordingly, as well as `credits` and values in the `Progression Purchse Tracking`-section
* No roll buttons
* Sheet Version 1.70 - See [Readme](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/Hc%20Svnt%20Dracones%20Second%20Edition) for Sheet Changelog

 [Game's homepage](https://hsdroleplayinggame.com/)
